fullText: The new Broadway revival of Evita is like a beautiful vintage car that's been lovingly restored but whose engine still doesn't quite purr. Elena Roger, the Argentine actress who originated the role of Eva Perón in the London revival, brings authenticity and a gorgeous voice to the part, but the production feels oddly bloodless.
